title: Maul
content:
Maul Common 2~12 Damage 2d6Bludgeoning Main Hand OnlyTenacity: When you miss an attack, you deal Bludgeoning damage anyway. Proficiency with this weapon type unlocks: Hammers like this are used in many dwarven competitions, testing who can throw them the farthest while enduring the most ale. MaulTwo-Handed 4.5 30

Main Hand OnlyTenacity: When you miss an attack, you deal Bludgeoning damage anyway.

Proficiency with this weapon type unlocks:

Hammers like this are used in many dwarven competition
